name: XOLOTL - the soul companion
description:
<><><><>                             XOLOTL - the soul companion                   <><><> <> <>

As part of Art and Intereaction class, we were asked to redesign the infemous game "Flappy Bird" 

The game is inspired by the Aztec mythology - the story of  Xolotl  the Sunset god. After the destruction of all life, Xolotl took a journey into the underworld in order to retrieve the bones of humanity. with these bones, they could  restored humanity and life.

                                                                                 <><><><>

Will you be able to help Xolotl in his quest and journey into the depths of the underworld  or shall you fail and lose all hope for humanity ?
